name: Cynosura
summary: Cynosura is a first-person sci-fi survival sandbox game with RPG elements. Creative building and clever crafting mechanics enable players to manipulate and explore a wonderous and mystical array of worlds. The game will probably cater to those who liked kerbal space program, starbound and space engineers, as it will provide the necessary tools to explore a vast game universe. It will also introduce a complex array of survival and RPG elements for character development, as well as building and crafting what is necessary to survive in inhospitable environments.
